Posts.Content: how has your treatment been with mgn3? My father was recently diagnosed with non-small cell lung cancer and has less than 2 months to live. At 76 they don't feel he would tolerate chemo and would be miserable his last days so we're trying mgn3. Please Please reply. Kathy s.
Posts.Title: MGN-3

Posts.Content: Has anyone had positive results from MGN-3? My father is diagnosed and is pretty far along, and at 76 they think he won't tolerate chemo well. We feel he doesn't have very long and are wondering if anyone else has tried MGN-3. Kathy S.
Posts.Title: MGN-3
